articles.title: Sam Nujoma: First president of Namibia dies aged 95 - BBC.com
articles.description: Nujoma has been called the country's founding father after leading the fight for independence from South Africa.
articles.content:
Thomas Mackintosh & Farouk Chothia
The first president of independent Namibia, Sam Nujoma, has died at the age of 95 in the capital Windhoek, the country's current leader has announced. 
Nujoma… [+3149 chars]
